ILBVec2 Struct Reference

This reference page is linked to from the following overview topics: Reading UV Layer Data.

Search for all occurrences

#include <beastapitypes.h>

Class Description

Two dimensional geometric vector type.


Used for both points and vectors

Examples:

examples-physical/code/common/vecmath.h, examples/code/atlas/atlas.cpp, examples/code/baking/baking.cpp, examples/code/common/vecmath.h, examples/code/common/xmlwriter.h, examples/code/unwrapping/unwrapping.cpp, include/beastapi/beastapitypes.h, include/beastapi/beastmesh.h, include/beastapi/beasttargetentity.h, include/beastapi/beastuvlayer.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastmeshwrapper.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastmeshwrapper.cpp, maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beasttargetentitywrapper.cpp, and maya/beastmayaplugin/src/resourcemanager.cpp.
